TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OnDeserializingAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class OnDeserializingAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class OnDeserializingAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 当应用于方法时，指定在反序列化对象关系图中的对象期间调用该方法。

span.span: When applied to a method, specifies that the method is called during deserialization of an object in an object graph.

summary.span: 相对于关系图中的其他对象，该反序列化的顺序是不确定的。

span.span: The order of deserialization relative to other objects in the graph is non-deterministic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用若要在反序列化过程中设置默认值。Use the to set default values during deserialization. 例如，如果正在反序列化的类型不包含构造函数，创建一个方法来设置此实例中的任何字段的值并将特性应用于该方法。For example, if the type that you are deserializing does not contain a constructor, create a method to set values of any fields in the instance and apply the attribute to the method. 若要使用，该方法必须包含参数。To use the , the method must contain a parameter. 该特性标记要序列化基础结构由调用的方法和提供有关正在进行的序列化的类型的其他数据。The attribute marks the method to be called by the serialization infrastructure and the provides additional data about the type of serialization taking place. 使用以下代码所示：The usage is shown in the following code: [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerialization#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerialization/CS/OnSerializationOnDeserializationExample.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerialization#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerialization/VB/OnSerializationOnDeserializationExample.vb#4)] > [!NOTE] > 在代码中，可以使用 `OnDeserializing` 一词来代替较长的 。In your code, you can use the word `OnDeserializing` instead of the longer . ## Examples 下面的示例应用， ， ，和属性和类中的方法。The following example applies the , , , and attributes to methods in a class. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerialization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerialization/CS/OnSerializationOnDeserializationExample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerialization#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Serialization.OnSerialization/VB/OnSerializationOnDeserializationExample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
